item.title: Runescape vs WoW
item.dc:creator: @Lumberjackt Lumberjackt
item.description:
@Lumberjackt wrote:

I have played Wow for about 4 months.

  • You cant do much in world of warcraft compared to… rs/morrowind/daggerfall/wc3/ogre battle, its extremely linear trade skills suck except for alchemy and engineering and the level cap is gay you only get to level 70 or whatever combat (mainly running dungeons) and like 5 trade skills which can go to 300 (you level each time you use your trade skills and you dont grind for mats usually you just find them sitting around and trade mats you dont need for ones you do which leads me to…)
  • economy sucks. a character really only needs 1000 gold for his mount and then for repairing your equipment as you play, you dont really use gold the way you use it in runescape to directly buy mats and expendables to level up your guy.
  • Alliance is full of virgins and pedos
  • Horde is cool but way outnumbered by noob zerg alliance, also very sleepy and hard to find good groups
  • PVP blows in wow if you think I am wrong go pick up diablo 2 and try it its way more fun for pvp, in wow you dont lose anything in pvp no items no experience no loss on your record its basically meant for little kids who will cry if they lose
  • In PVM things are based mainly around team play in long dungeons whether you are doing a small lower level dungeon with like 5 people up to high level guilds who have 100+ members. People do simple repetitive jobs in a party (warriors soak up damage, mages deal damage, priests heal damage) and if one guy fucks up the 5 hours of running the dungeon can be wasted just like that. Probably the most frustrating aspect of the game right here.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape vs WoW
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:10, topic:77283”]Overexagerate much? It’s £8.99, that’s a fair price imo.

Also, how is it a hack and slash? OK it’s not a “true” RPG, but there’s a lot more RP element to it than there is Runescape… Runescapes “lore” consist of “olook there are 3 gods, one is leik good, and one iz baddd and one is balanced!”, whereas WoW has a huge backstory, and pretty much any game “desicion” can be backed up by lore, although Blizzard largely pull this out of their ass It works though, if you’re into the RP side.[/quote]

Its £20 Lol, Saw The Gamecard In Gamestation Today

item.title: Runescape vs WoW
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

[quote=“Click Here, post:12, topic:77283”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=113404.msg1132412#msg1132412 date=1176237223]
Overexagerate much? It’s £8.99, that’s a fair price imo.

Also, how is it a hack and slash? OK it’s not a “true” RPG, but there’s a lot more RP element to it than there is Runescape… Runescapes “lore” consist of “olook there are 3 gods, one is leik good, and one iz baddd and one is balanced!”, whereas WoW has a huge backstory, and pretty much any game “desicion” can be backed up by lore, although Blizzard largely pull this out of their ass It works though, if you’re into the RP side.
[/quote] 8.99, still a rip and no imn ot overexagurating[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 04:17:37 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Click Here link=topic=113404.msg1134428#msg1134428 date=1176261457]

[quote author=Mopman link=topic=113404.msg1132412#msg1132412 date=1176237223]
Overexagerate much? It’s £8.99, that’s a fair price imo.

Also, how is it a hack and slash? OK it’s not a “true” RPG, but there’s a lot more RP element to it than there is Runescape… Runescapes “lore” consist of “olook there are 3 gods, one is leik good, and one iz baddd and one is balanced!”, whereas WoW has a huge backstory, and pretty much any game “desicion” can be backed up by lore, although Blizzard largely pull this out of their ass It works though, if you’re into the RP side.
[/quote] 8.99, still a rip and no im not overexagurating
[/quote][/quote]

Also, how is it a hack and slash? OK it’s not a “true” RPG, but there’s a lot more RP element to it than there is Runescape… Runescapes “lore” consist of “olook there are 3 gods, one is leik good, and one iz baddd and one is balanced!”, whereas WoW has a huge backstory, and pretty much any game “desicion” can be backed up by lore, although Blizzard largely pull this out of their ass It works though, if you’re into the RP side.
